author: Ross Marchand
title: The World Health Organization is Out of Control
description: Rather leading during crisis, it's parroting Chinese government talking points and presenting unusable data. The post The World Health Organization is Out of Control appeared first on The American Conservative.
content: Rather leading during crisis, it's parroting Chinese government talking points and presenting unusable data.As the United Nations dedicated public health agency, one might assume that the World Health Organization (WHO) is doing everything in its power to fig… [+4153 chars]
